# Priyata Kalra - Computational Pharmacologist, AI Product Manager & Mentor

> Expert PBPK/QSP scientist and AI Product Manager offering mentorship in pharmaceutical sciences, AI/ML in drug discovery, and career development. 10+ years of experience at Simulations Plus, Bayer AG, BASF SE. Available for mentorship sessions and consulting.

## About

Priyata Kalra is a computational pharmacologist and product manager at the intersection of AI, pharmaceutical sciences, and philosophy. She specializes in PBPK (Physiologically-Based Pharmacokinetic) and QSP (Quantitative Systems Pharmacology) modeling, with deep expertise in applying AI/ML to drug discovery and development.

Currently working at the forefront of AI-driven pharmaceutical innovation, Priyata bridges the gap between cutting-edge research and practical product development. Her unique background combines rigorous scientific training with product leadership experience.

## Services

### Mentorship Sessions
- **Career Coffee Chat** (€20, 30 min) - Career guidance for researchers and scientists
- **Technical Deep Dive** (€50, 60 min) - PBPK/QSP modeling, AI/ML in pharma
- **Product Leadership Session** (€75, 60 min) - Transitioning from scientist to product manager

### Topics Covered
- PBPK/QSP modeling and simulation
- AI/ML applications in pharmaceutical sciences
- Career transitions from academia to industry
- Scientist to product manager pathway
- Women in STEM mentorship
- Drug discovery and development workflows

## Expertise

### Technical Specializations
- Physiologically-Based Pharmacokinetic (PBPK) Modeling
- Quantitative Systems Pharmacology (QSP)
- AI and Machine Learning in Drug Discovery
- Toxicology and Drug Safety Assessment
- Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics
- In Silico Drug Development
- Drug-Drug Interaction Modeling
- Clinical Pharmacology Simulation
- IVIVE (In Vitro to In Vivo Extrapolation)
- New Approach Methodologies (NAMs)

### Leadership & Product
- AI Product Management in Pharma
- Scientific Software Development
- Regulatory Science (FDA PBPK Submissions)
- High-Risk Pharmaceutical Project Leadership

## Professional Background

### Experience
- **Simulations Plus** - AI Product Manager, leading PKPD & PBPK product strategy
- **Bayer AG** - Computational Pharmacology Researcher
- **BASF SE** - Toxicology and Safety Assessment
- **PhD, Heidelberg University** - Computational Pharmacology

### Credentials
- Oxford Saïd Business School Leadership Programme
- Mentor at Life Science Accelerator Baden-Württemberg (since 2021)
- Women in AI Volunteer
- PhD Supervisor Experience
- Fortune 500 Pharmaceutical Consulting

### Speaking & Publications
- AAPS (American Association of Pharmaceutical Scientists)
- Bioanalysis Zone Expert Contributions
- Solvo Transporters Research Collaborations
- Multiple peer-reviewed publications in pharmaceutical sciences
